## WidthMediaQueries type

This type adds media queries to a hook configuration when breakpoints are specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type WidthMediaQueries<C> = C extends { breakpoints: string[] }
  ? BreakpointsToMediaQueries<C["breakpoints"]>
  : object;
```
**References:** [BreakpointsToMediaQueries](./recommended.breakpointstomediaqueries.md)
